patterns: What kinds of products are there?

patterns: How soon can I get my order?
responses: Delivery typically takes 2-4 business days.
Shipping usually takes 2-4 days.
We offer standard delivery (2-4 days) and express shipping (1-2 days).
Express shipping is available for delivery in 1-2 days.
Standard shipping takes 2-4 days, or choose express for 1-2 days.
Your order can arrive in 2-4 days with standard delivery.
Need it fast? Express shipping gets it to you in 1-2 days!

patterns: Do you have a funny story?
responses: Why did the coffee go to therapy? It had too many 'grounds' for anxiety!
What do you call a sad cup of coffee? A depresso!
Why did the tea go to school? To improve its steep-esteem!
What do you call a dinosaur that takes tea? A Sip-a-saurus!
Why was the coffee so good at singing? It was brewed with deCAF!
What did the coffee say to the tea? You're steeping on my turf!
Why don't coffees ever fight? They just brew peace!
